values.type: String -> Form.Validate.Validation e a -> Form.Validate.Validation e a

values.comment:
Access given field, wrapped in a `maybe` (Nothing if error).

    "hobby" ?= string
values.type: String -> Form.Validate.Validation e a -> Form.Validate.Validation e (Maybe.Maybe a)

values.comment:
Infix version of `apply`:

Form.succeed SomeRecord
|: ("foo" := string)
|: ("bar" := string)
values.type: Form.Validate.Validation e (a -> b) -> Form.Validate.Validation e a -> Form.Validate.Validation e b
